Name: official/cas
Description: The Central Authentication Service (CAS) is a single sign-on protocol for the web.

Configuration.Name: limit/max_number
Configuration.Description: Max number of login retries (0 means disabled)

Configuration.Name: limit/failure_store_time
Configuration.Description: Max time to store failed logins (in seconds); has to be set > 0 when limit/max_number is > 0

Configuration.Name: limit/lock_time
Configuration.Description: Time to lock an account if limit/max_number is reached (in seconds); has to be set > 0 when limit/max_number is > 0

Configuration.Name: forgot_password_text
Configuration.Description: Text which shall be shown if a user clicks 'Forgot Password'

Configuration.Name: legal_urls/terms_of_service
Configuration.Description: This URL links to the Terms of Service and will be the first link at the bottom of login or logout pages. If empty the whole link will be omitted. If changed the CAS dogu must be restarted to take effect.

Configuration.Name: legal_urls/imprint
Configuration.Description: This URL links to the Imprint and will be the second link at the bottom of login or logout pages. If empty the whole link will be omitted. If changed the CAS dogu must be restarted to take effect.

Configuration.Name: legal_urls/privacy_policy
Configuration.Description: This URL links to the Privacy Policy and will be the last link at the bottom of login or logout pages. If empty the whole link will be omitted. If changed the CAS dogu must be restarted to take effect.

Configuration.Name: session_tgt/max_time_to_live_in_seconds
Configuration.Description: Maximum session timeout - TGT will expire after defined timespan regardless the usage

Configuration.Name: session_tgt/time_to_kill_in_seconds
Configuration.Description: Idle session timeout -  TGT will expire sooner if no further requests keep the session alive

Configuration.Name: ldap/host
Configuration.Description: The host of the LDAP (without protocol and without port), e.g. ldap if LDAP dogu is used.

Configuration.Name: ldap/port
Configuration.Description: The port of the LDAP, e.g. 389

Configuration.Name: ldap/base_dn
Configuration.Description: Base DN of users to be authenticated, "(dc=cloudogu,dc=com)". This value is only used when using an external LDAP.

Configuration.Name: ldap/connection_dn
Configuration.Description: Manager DN for authenticated searches, e.g. "(cn=admin,dc=cloudogu,dc=com)" This value is only used when using an external LDAP.

Configuration.Name: ldap/password
Configuration.Description: The password for connection to ldap in encrypted form. This value is only used when using an external LDAP.

Configuration.Name: ldap/search_filter
Configuration.Description: Search filter used for configurations that require searching for DNs, e.g. (objectClass=person)

Configuration.Name: ldap/ds_type
Configuration.Description: Type of the LDAP

Configuration.Name: ldap/encryption
Configuration.Description: Type of the encryption of the LDAP. Defaults to 'none'.

Configuration.Name: ldap/attribute_id
Configuration.Description: The attribute for the user ID in the LDAP

Configuration.Name: ldap/attribute_given_name
Configuration.Description: The attribute for the user's given name in the LDAP

Configuration.Name: ldap/attribute_surname
Configuration.Description: The attribute for the user's surname in the LDAP

Configuration.Name: ldap/attribute_fullname
Configuration.Description: The attribute for the user's fullname in the LDAP, which can also be seen as display name like "John Doe"

Configuration.Name: ldap/attribute_mail
Configuration.Description: The attribute for the user's mail address in the LDAP

Configuration.Name: ldap/attribute_group
Configuration.Description: The user's group membership attribute (e.g. memberOf)

Configuration.Name: ldap/group_attribute_name
Configuration.Description: Name of the attribute for groups (the group's user membership attribute) in LDAP, e.g. member

Configuration.Name: ldap/group_base_dn
Configuration.Description: Settings for ldap group search by member. Base dn for group search e.g.: o=ces.local,dc=cloudogu,dc=com

Configuration.Name: ldap/group_search_filter
Configuration.Description: Search filter for group search. If this property is empty, group search by member will be skipped

Configuration.Name: logging/root
Configuration.Description: Set the root log level to one of ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG.

Configuration.Name: container_config/memory_limit
Configuration.Description: Limits the container's memory usage. Use a positive integer value followed by one of these units [b,k,m,g] (byte, kibibyte, mebibyte, gibibyte).

Configuration.Name: container_config/swap_limit
Configuration.Description: Limits the container's swap memory usage. Use zero or a positive integer value followed by one of these units [b,k,m,g] (byte, kibibyte, mebibyte, gibibyte). 0 will disable swapping.

Configuration.Name: container_config/java_max_ram_percentage
Configuration.Description: Limits the heap stack size of the CAS process to the configured percentage of the available physical memory when the container has more than approx. 250 MB of memory available. Is only considered when a memory_limit is set. Use a valid float value with decimals between 0 and 100 (f. ex. 55.0 for 55%). Default value for CAS: 25%

Configuration.Name: container_config/java_min_ram_percentage
Configuration.Description: Limits the heap stack size of the CAS process to the configured percentage of the available physical memory when the container has less than approx. 250 MB of memory available. Is only considered when a memory_limit is set. Use a valid float value with decimals between 0 and 100 (f. ex. 55.0 for 55%). Default value for CAS: 50%
